Question: This person has been nominated for 13 Emmy Awards for her work in television.
Hints: This person has a Grammy, two Daytime Emmys, two Golden Globes, a Tony (for production, not acting), and an Oscar.
And through Alvin, this person has another two grandchildren who are six and nine years younger than Amarah.
In 2012, this person guest starred as Jane Marsh, Sue Heck's guidance counselor in the TV series, The Middle.
